item.title: Striped Chair
item.description:
Auction Rules, Terms, and Conditions:

  1. The online silent auction will run from 8AM Tuesday, March 19th through 11:59PM Wednesday, March 20th.
  2. The bid price will increase once all availiable quantities of an item have been claimed. All bid participants will be notified of a competing bid/price increase via email by the host.
  3. Payment for any purchased items must be received before pickup. Accepted forms of payment include cash, ACH bank transfer, Visa, MasterCard, and American Express.
  4. All...
